# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_CHAT_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

add_library(minecpp_chat STATIC)

# Public include headers
target_include_directories(minecpp_chat
  PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
  PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include/minecpp/chat
)

# Source subdirectory
add_subdirectory("src")

target_link_libraries(minecpp_chat
        LINK_PUBLIC
        minecpp_format
        LINK_PRIVATE
        minecpp_utils
        fmt::fmt
)
